articles.description: Steve Borthwick has the pleasure of nit-picking through fine details after his England side swat aside Wales in their Six Nations opener.
articles.title: England 48-7 Wales: Hosts focus on fine-tuning after big win

articles.description: Team GB's mixed doubles curlers clinched their place in the Winter Olympics semi-finals with two matches to spare, after statement victories over heavyweights Canada and United States maintained their 100% record.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Bruce Mouat and Jen Dodds beat United States to clinch semi-final

articles.description: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe admitted he is "not doing my job well enough" after Saturday's defeat by Brentford - but is he under pressure?
articles.title: Newcastle 2-3 Brentford: How much pressure is Howe really under?

articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav rescues India from an almighty scare as T20 World Cup co-hosts beat the United States by 29 runs in Mumbai.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Suryakumar Yadav rescues India from all-time shock by United States

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how things are shaping up as the fight for Premier League survival hots up.
articles.title: Are West Ham single-handedly keeping the relegation battle alive?

articles.description: Barcelona move four points clear at the top of La Liga with a 3-0 win at home against Mallorca, as Lamine Yamal scores the pick of the goals.
articles.title: Barcelona 3-0 Mallorca: Lamine Yamal and Robert Lewandowski strike for La Liga leaders

articles.description: Thomas Frank admits Tottenham captain Cristian Romero's week ended in a "perfect storm" with a red card at Manchester United.
articles.title: Cristian Romero red card: Tottenham captain's week ends in 'perfect storm'

articles.description: Arguments for Gregor Townsend remaining as Scotland head coach are growing increasingly small after familiar failings lead to defeat in rainy Rome, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: 'Gregor Townsend on the ropes as Scotland head coach after romp in swamp'

articles.description: Former NFL linebacker Darron Lee is charged with first-degree murder and tampering with evidence after the death of his girlfriend.
articles.title: Darron Lee: Ex-NFL player charged with murdering girlfriend

articles.description: Usman Nurmagomedov outclasses Alfie Davis before submitting the Briton in the third round to retain his PFL lightweight title in Dubai.
articles.title: PFL Dubai: Usman Nurmagomedov submits Alfie Davis in third round to retain lightweight title
